org.trellisldp.api

Interface ResourceService


  • public interface ResourceService
    The ResourceService provides methods for creating, retrieving and manipulating repository resources.

    • Method Summary

      • put

        java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Boolean> put(IRI identifier,
                                                   IRI ixnModel,
                                                   Dataset dataset)
        Put a resource into the repository.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier for the new resource
        ixnModel - the LDP interaction model for this resource
        dataset - the dataset
        Returns:
        whether the resource was added

      • getContainer

        default java.util.Optional<IRI> getContainer(IRI identifier)
        Get the identifier for the structurally-logical container for the resource.

        Note: The returned identifier is not guaranteed to exist.

        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        Returns:
        an identifier for the structurally-logical container

      • compact

        java.util.stream.Stream<IRI> compact(IRI identifier,
                                     java.time.Instant from,
                                     java.time.Instant until)
        Compact (rewrite the history) of a resource.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        from - a time after which a resource is to be compacted
        until - a time before which a resource is to be compacted
        Returns:
        a stream of binary IRIs that can be safely purged

      • purge

        java.util.stream.Stream<IRI> purge(IRI identifier)
        Purge a resource from the repository.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        Returns:
        a stream of binary IRIs that can be safely purged

      • scan

        java.util.stream.Stream<? extends Triple> scan()
        Scan the resources.
        Returns:
        a stream of RDF Triples, containing the resource and its LDP type

      • skolemize

        default RDFTerm skolemize(RDFTerm term)
        Skolemize a blank node.
        Parameters:
        term - the RDF term
        Returns:
        a skolemized node, if a blank node; otherwise the original term

      • unskolemize

        default RDFTerm unskolemize(RDFTerm term)
        Un-skolemize a blank node.
        Parameters:
        term - the RDF term
        Returns:
        a blank node, if a previously-skolemized node; otherwise the original term

        Return an "internal" representation of an RDF term.

        Parameters:

      • export

        default java.util.stream.Stream<? extends Quad> export(java.util.Collection<IRI> graphNames)
        Export the complete repository as a stream of Quads.
        Parameters:
        graphNames - the graph names to export
        Returns:
        a stream of quads, where each named graph refers to the resource identifier

      • getIdentifierSupplier

        java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> getIdentifierSupplier()
        An identifier supplier.
        Returns:
        a supplier of identifiers for new resources
